A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Having been built on a bad foundation with the force awakens here comes a second dose of disappointment.  You sit there for nearly two and a half hours waiting for something good to happen or make sense and it never comes.

To the people that say we are hating it because we are not getting the theories or predictions we wanted they are wrong.  There simply is no explanations to some of the main characters that needed to be followed up and were over looked.  The side quests are just a waste and the new technology is as lame as "star killer base."

In the time of remakes for movies I hope that this trilogy will be although I guess with the force awakens that would be a remake of a remake.  Sad times for star wars fans.  Disney is just in it for the profits.

Help us George Lucas you're our only hope!
